snippet: Pet trusts help the elderly plan for their animals, a $100 weekend in Austin, Tex., H.P.V. vaccine recommended for all boys and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Pet trusts help the elderly plan for their animals, a $100 weekend in Austin, Tex., H.P.V. vaccine recommended for all boys and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and on our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Pet Trusts Help Elderly Plan for Their Animals
